body:
Comment 2 by **nullsquid**: 
yes, looks like it was..
bison version was 1.28
http://mywheel.net/blog/index.php/2006/03/28/gnu-bison-broken-on-mac-os-x/
reaffirms this is rubbish.
error goes away with bison 2.0

next error is:
quietgcc -o 8g -L/Users/xxx/go/lib ../8l/enam.o list.o galign.o gobj.o ggen.o gsubr.o
cgen.o cgen64.o peep.o reg.o  ../gc/gc.ao -lbio -l9 -lm
/usr/bin/ld: Undefined symbols:
_yychar
_p9main
collect2: ld returned 1 exit status
make: *** [8g] Error 1


...which I guess is probably because my ld is too old.. I'll check it out before
posting another issue. thanks for the help!
